card.name: COMP — The Love Bug
card.text: Companion — Each creature card in your starting deck has power 3 or less. Creatures spells you cast have offspring {G/W} (You may pay an additional {G/W} as you cast a creature. If you do, when it enters, create a 1/1 token copy of it.) You must cast creatures with their offspring cost paid. Offspring tokens aren’t legendary.

card.name: Quantum Retriever
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have this become a copy of any creature card in exile until end of turn. Choose each card only once.

card.name: Sower of Fates
card.text: Whenever one or more players shuffle their library, add {R} or {G}. {T}: Any number of target players shuffle their library.

card.name: Banishing Act
card.text: Choose one: • Exile target nontoken creature with mana value X. Note it permanently. • Create a token copy of a noted card with mana value X. Entwine {X} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Eclipse of the Green Sun
card.text: Tutor a random permanent with mana value X from target opponent’s library to the battlefield under your control. Flashback XGGGG

card.name: Murd-est
card.text: Destroy target creature. If that creature would be put into a graveyard this way, remove it from its owner’s collection for the rest of the match instead.

card.name: Blabbermouth Countermage
card.text: While this card is in your hand, play with your hand revealed. Flash When this enters, counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.

card.name: Contingency Cavalier
card.text: First strike, protection from sideboarded cards (Be honest, opponents. If you sideboarded in more copies of a card that was already in your deck during game 1, all copies count.)

card.name: Deep Cavern Brat
card.text: Flying, lifelink When this enters, look at target opponent’s hand and choose a card. Exchange that card with a card from your hand until this creature leaves the battlefield.

card.name: The Golden Boy
card.text: When you win the game on a turn where The Golden Boy dealt damage, it gains the following ability for as long as you own it: “You may trade this card along with a sealed booster pack. The recipient may open the pack and add its contents to their collection.”

card.name: Fires of Alexandria
card.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as it’s a permanent, treat it as though it’s on the battlefield. If it’s a creature, it gains haste. (These permanents don’t trigger “enters” or “leaves” abilities from being revealed or drawn.) You may skip your draw step.

card.name: Topsy Turvy Stomper
card.text: Vigilance, trample Reverse vigilance (Blocking causes this creature to tap.) Reverse trample (When blocking, this creature deals excess combat damage to the blocked creature’s controller.)

card.name: Llanowar Mafia
card.text: {T}: Destroy target creature an opponent controls unless they let you add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Steward of Forgotten Lands
card.text: You can activate mana abilities of lands in your graveyard. This creature’s power and toughness are equal to the number of untapped lands in your graveyard. (Untap your graveyard during your untap step.)

card.name: Stranger than Fact or Fiction
card.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library and the top three cards of an opponent’s library. That opponent separates those cards into two face up piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Reflections of the Moon
card.text: Enchant permanent Nonbasic lands are copies of enchanted permanent.

card.name: Sphinx of Few Secrets
We Need a Hero
card.text: Tutor a creature with mana value less than or equal to the total power of creatures attacking you to the battlefield.

card.name: Overzealous Spymaster
Geoguessr
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card. An opponent guesses the name of that card. If they guess correctly, put it into your hand. Otherwise, choose one: • Put it onto the battlefield. • Put it into your hand, then return this card to your hand.

card.name: Stun Battalion
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and are non-lethal. (If damage they deal would destroy a creature, instead tap and put a stun counter on that creature. Damage they deal can’t reduce a player’s life total to less than 1.)

card.name: Thunder Order Hellkite
card.text: Flying, trample, haste Cards in your hand are Shock.

card.name: Carnage Order Shaman
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Creature cards in your hand are Colossal Dreadmaw.

card.name: Grave Order Hellpriest
card.text: Noncreature, nonland cards in your hand are Murder. 1BB: Return this creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Honor Order Halberd
card.text: When this enters, attach it to target creature you control. Creature cards in your hand are copies of equipped creature. Equip 1W

card.name: Spawning Slime
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a copy of Spawning Slime. Channel — 2G/UG/U, Discard Spawning Slime: Target creature you control becomes a copy of another target creature.

card.name: The Hills Have Elves
card.text: Lands that enter the battlefield from your library enter as copies of Elvish Archdruid. Whenever one or more creatures deal combat damage to an opponent, tutor a basic land to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Ninja Librarian
card.text: Ninjutsu from your library 1UB (1UB, Shuffle an unblocked attacker you control into your library: Tutor this card onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.) When this deals combat damage to a player, look at their hand. You may put a card from their hand on top of their library. If you do, shuffle this into your library.

card.name: Kidnapper
card.text: Deathtouch Ninjutsu for an opponent’s creature 3U/BU/B (3U/BU/B, Return an unblocked attacker an opponent controls to your hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand under the attacking player’s control tapped and attacking.)

card.name: Merchant of Magic
card.text: When this or another creature enters under your control, create a Treasure token. {T}: Create an exiled copy of a random card worth over $100. You may cast it for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: Wurmfriend
card.text: When this enters, create a tapped 6/6 green Wurm creature token with “This creature can’t attack or block.” 2GG: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and gains trample.

card.name: Peace
card.text: Sacrifice a creature. Surveil 2. --- Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Winkmage
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice this creature: It deals X damage to any target, and target player draws X cards, where X is the number of spells on the stack.

card.name: Magpie Prizemage
card.text: Flying, ward {1} Whenever one or more creatures deal combat damage to a player, their controller may put an exiled card with a prize counter into their hand. --- Exile the top six cards of target player’s library and put prize counters on each.

card.name: Spontaneous Spellbag
card.text: Before the match, set aside a spellbook of exactly five instant or sorcery cards with different names and mana value 2 or less. (These cards remain face down and aren’t part of your deck.) {2}, {T}: Cast a random card from Spontaneous Spellbag’s spellbook.

card.name: Land Tax Peacekeeper
card.text: When this enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each land your opponents control. Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, they move a counter from that land onto a creature you control of their choice. (This ability doesn’t use the stack and must be done before that mana is spent.)

card.name: Stackwise Street Gambler
card.text: Flash This enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each spell or ability on the stack as it resolves. --- Reorder all spells and abilities on the stack. (Don’t choose new targets.)

card.name: Randomate Dead
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this, exile X creature cards from your graveyard, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast this spell. Return a random creature from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback XBB

card.name: Hunted Paranoiac
card.text: Vigilance When this enters, target opponent creates a Royal Assassin token. (It’s a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with “{T}: Destroy target tapped creature.”)

card.name: Boy With a Slingshot
card.text: Anyone can cast this card from the adventure zone. Deathtouch, reach --- Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

card.name: Snake Stomper
card.text: Trample This enters with two +1/+1 counters for each Snake your opponents control. --- Target player creates a 1/1 green Snake creature token with deathtouch.

card.name: Darkslick Baron
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice an artifact: Scry 2. {2}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card. --- Miracle XR (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it’s the first card you drew this turn.) Create X Treasure tokens.

card.name: Scabalanche
card.text: Decayed (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) When Scabalanche leaves the battlefield, you may have an opponent’s life total become equal to your life total. Unearth 5H/BH/B (5H/BH/B: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Pugilla, the Punching Queen

prop.type: Legendary Creature - Devil Fighter // Sorcery - Adventure

card.text: When Pugilla enters, she fights any number of target modified creatures. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.) --- Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures.

card.name: Ent Spawning Ground
card.text: When this enters, create a 1/1 green Treefolk creature token for each other land that entered this turn. {T}: Add {G} --- Tutor a land onto the battlefield.

card.name: Persnickity Partygoer
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this, target five creatures. Lifelink --- Create three 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Mindless Marauder
card.text: Menace, deathtouch This enters with X +1/+1 counters, where X is five minus the number of cards in your hand. --- Discard any number of cards. Exile that many cards from the top of your library. You may play them until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Master Class
card.text: (Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.) You may look at and play the top card of your library. 1R: Level 2 Creatures you cast from the top of your library gain haste. 3G: Level 3 You may play any number of additional lands per turn from the top of your library.

card.name: Zip, Speed Dreamer
card.text: Flying, menace, haste When this deals combat damage to an opponent, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn gains rebound. (Exile the next spell you cast as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Copy Cap
Stitcharoo
card.text: {0}: This becomes a copy of target creature card in any graveyard, except it retains this ability, and this ability’s cost increases by {2}. Activate only once per turn.

card.name: Xzadaria, the Desirer
card.text: Flying, ward {2/U} Instead of drawing from your library, you may draw from any zone. (The zones are library, hand, battlefield, graveyard, stack, exile, and command zone. To draw from the stack, choose the top card. To draw from another public zone, choose any card from it. To draw from an opponent’s hand, choose a card at random.)

card.name: Ford Windstar
card.text: Flying Multiverse Traveler — This creature’s power and toughness are equal to the number of different sets among other nonland, nontoken permanents on the battlefield. (Refer to set codes in the bottom left, or set symbols. Proxies don’t count.) Crew 2

card.name: Knockoff Tinkerer
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, you may pay 1W. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of that creature, except it’s a 1/1 Toy artifact creature. Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Tharambuul the Ivory Tome
card.text: Whenever an opponent adds mana to their mana pool, add the same amount to yours. You don’t lose mana added this way as steps and phases end. 2G: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Botanical Biohacker
card.text: {T}: Add one of any symbol among mana symbols on permanents you control to your mana pool. (Generic symbols add that much colorless mana.)

card.name: Spork
card.text: Copy target spell unless its controller pays {X}. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Tabletop Game Cafe
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. You may shuffle. {T}: Draw a card, then discard it. {T}: Create a 1/1 artifact creature token with “When this enters, sacrifice it.” {T}: Cast a copy of Counterspell, targeting itself. {T}: Return this land to your hand.

card.name: Reimagine
card.text: Kicker 3U Put target nonland permanent on the stack under its owner’s control. If you paid the kicker cost, instead put it on the stack under your control. Overload UUU (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change “target” in its text to “each.”)

card.name: Call of the Void
card.text: When this enters, each opponent may sacrifice a nontoken creature. If a player does, each player draws a card. {H/B}: Until end of turn, if a card says a player “may” do something, they must do it. (If able. Include reminder text.)

card.name: Lightning Rodrick
card.text: Haste Ward—Choose one: {R} or Lightning Rodrick deals 3 damage to you. If a spell or ability could target this creature, it must.

card.name: Syr Ixarch the Inevitable
card.text: Menace When this enters or attacks, put a toxic 1 counter on each creature you control. (Players dealt combat damage by those creatures also get poison counters equal to their toxic level.)

card.name: Gaea's Cradlemaker
card.text: When this attacks, create a Gaea’s Cradle token. (It’s a legendary land with “{T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.”) At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice a land token.

card.name: Sparkling Starling
card.text: Flying You may cast this creature’s Adventure from the battlefield. (If you do, exile it on an Adventure.) --- Exile another target creature. Return it to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: It That Shuns Hope
card.text: Menace, ward—Exile all but the bottom three cards of your library. When you cast this, exile target permanent. You may cast exiled cards your opponents own. Warp {5}

card.name: It That Lays Waste
card.text: Trample, ward—Sacrifice two lands When this enters or attacks, each opponent discards a card at random. At the beginning of your end step, return a card from each player’s graveyard that was put there this turn to your hand. Warp 3C

card.name: Seeker of Peace
card.text: Whenever you attack, put a charge counter on this for each attacking creature. Then if this has ten or more charge counters, unlock the other side. Untap X attacking creatures you control: Exile target nontoken creature with mana value X. --- (Back): Swords to Plowshares

card.text: --- (Front): Seeker of Peace

card.name: Seeker of Possibilities
card.text: Whenever you scry, surveil, or shuffle, put a charge counter on this. Then if this has ten or more charge counters, unlock the other side. {T}: Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. {4}: Shuffle your library. Untap this creature. --- (Back): Brainstorm

card.name: Brainstorm
card.text: --- (Front): Seeker of Possibilities

card.name: Seeker of the Void
card.text: Whenever another creature dies, put a charge counter on this. Then if this has ten or more charge counters, unlock the other side. {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Add BBB. --- (Back): Dark Ritual

card.text: --- (Front): Seeker of the Void

card.name: Seeker of Paradise
card.text: Whenever you have ten or more mana in your mana pool, unlock the other side. {T}: Look at the top two cards of your library. You may put a land from among them onto the battlefield. If you do, it becomes a 1/1 green Insect creature land. --- (Back): Birds of Paradise

card.text: --- (Front): Seeker of Paradise

card.name: Seeker of Thunder
card.text: Whenever you or a source you control deals noncombat damage, put that many charge counters on this. Then if this has ten or more charge counters, unlock the other side. {T}: This deals 1 damage to any target. --- (Back): Lightning Bolt

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.text: --- (Front): Seeker of Thunder

card.name: Lord of the Deep Caverns
card.text: When this enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying. Whenever a Bat deals combat damage to an opponent, choose one: • They exile a card from their hand until that Bat leaves the battlefield. • Draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: COMP — Bladebringer
The Crowned Mosses
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery, each player reveals the top card of their library. Put all lands revealed this way onto the battlefield under your control. Landfall — Copy target spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: 506174-R the Optimizer
card.text: When this enters or attacks, scry 2. Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, look at the top five cards of your library. You may exile that spell and replace it with one of those cards if it shares a card type. Then shuffle. (The new spell doesn’t count as being cast, and its controller chooses new targets.)

[0]: Fetch — Tutor an artifact card with mana value X or less, where X is Isamaru’s loyalty, and exile that card. [-2]: Drop it — Put a card exiled by Isamaru into your hand.

card.name: Worlds Aflame
card.text: Choose one for each land that entered the battlefield this turn: • Worlds Aflame deals 3 damage to target creature. • Worlds Aflame deals 3 damage to target opponent. • Worlds Aflame deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. • Destroy target artifact with mana value 0.

card.name: Zero Point Compact
card.text: Once you cast this card, it must stay in your starting deck forever. When you choose a mode, cross it out forever. • Draw 2 cards and lose 2 life. • Destroy target nonblack creature. • Destroy target black creature. • Put a deathtouch counter on target creature. • Each opponent discards a card. • Tutor a card. Pay 2 life, discard this card: Surveil 2. Activate only if all modes are crossed out.

card.name: COMP — Omn, INEVITA Seer
card.text: Companion — You get no friendly seven or freebie mulligans. When this enters, each player mills 13 cards, then puts three random cards from their graveyard on top of their library in a random order. Eminence — If an opponent would mill one or more cards while this is on the battlefield or in the companion zone, they mill that many plus two.

card.text: At the beginning of each player’s end step, if that player didn’t attack this turn and it’s not an extra turn, they take an extra turn after this one. Warp 4UU
